name: Hentai Girl Run
description:
Introduction

Hentai Girl Run is a runner game,you only need to jump over the obstacles to earn money. You can get new clothes with money and unlock new levels.
There is no time limit in the game and it is an endless runner game. You can relax with girl dancing with 12 different dance moves.

Characteristics

  • Can change clothes
  • Can dance
  • Can unlock new levels
  • Can change hair color

Cheat Mode (Left Control + Left Shift + H)
